name: PharData.compressFiles
purpose: Compresses all files in the current tar/zip archive

return.description: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

errors:
Throws BadMethodCallException if
   the phar.readonly
   INI variable is on, the zlib
   extension is not available, or if any files are compressed using
   bzip2 compression and the bzip2 extension
   is not enabled.
